title: Textile, late 14th century
dimensions: H x W: 27 x 28 cm (10 5/8 in. x 11 in.)
description: Embroidery in red, blue, yellow, green and black silk on un-dyed linen, in chain, stem, long-armed cross and other stitches. Pattern consists of thirty-six squares of equal size filled with embroidered motifs of three types (eight-pointed star alternating with lozenge and spandrel in horizontal and vertical rows alternating with lozenge and spandrel and interlacing knot similarly arranged.

tombstone.epitaph: Textile, late 14th century; silk on linen; H x W: 27 x 28 cm (10 5/8 in. x 11 in.); 1941-41-1
